name: Top Down Space Shooter (Cool Team)
description:
Weird Controls ? Space and bullet hell ? You'll love this ! 

This game uses as few controls as possible, one joystick, aim with it to shoot, you will move in the other direction !

Welcome to the arena, you got to survive after your ship crashed into an asteroid feild, use your canon to push you back and escape the horde of enemies coming from the planet in the background.

We made this game for the first edition of the Fluffy Fairy Game Jams,  chill game jam where planning was made on friday and work done on saturday and sunday ! 

Credits :
